author.bio: Development tools, reusable patterns, and AI coding enhancements for modern web development

marketplaces.name: squirrelsoft-dev-tools
marketplaces.description: Curated collection of development tools, skills, and agents for Claude Code
marketplaces.repo_description: Curated collection of development tools, skills, and agents for Claude Code

files..claude-plugin/marketplace.json:
{
    "name": "squirrelsoft-dev-tools",
    "owner": {
        "name": "Scott Beardsley",
        "email": "contact@squirrelsoft.dev",
        "url": "https://github.com/squirrelsoft-dev"
    },
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "description": "Curated collection of development tools, skills, and agents for Claude Code",
    "author": "Scott Beardsley",
    "homepage": "https://squirrelsoft.dev",
    "plugins": [
        {
            "name": "claude-builder",
            "version": "1.0.0",
            "description": "Meta-tool for building Claude Code plugins, skills, and agents",
            "source": {
                "source": "github",
                "repo": "squirrelsoft-dev/claude-builder"
            },
            "category": "development",
            "tags": [
                "meta",
                "scaffolding",
                "generator",
                "plugin-development"
            ]
        },
        {
            "name": "doc-fetcher",
            "version": "2.9.1",
            "description": "Fetches, caches, and versions documentation from web sources to provide accurate, version-specific context for AI coding agents",
            "source": {
                "source": "github",
                "repo": "squirrelsoft-dev/doc-fetcher"
            },
            "category": "documentation",
            "tags": [
                "documentation",
                "cache",
                "versioning",
                "context"
            ]
        },
        {
            "name": "infinite-memory",
            "version": "0.1.6-alpha",
            "description": "Semantic memory system for Claude Code with persistent context retention through vector embeddings",
            "source": {
                "source": "github",
                "repo": "squirrelsoft-dev/infinite-memory"
            },
            "category": "development",
            "tags": [
                "semantic-search",
                "code-search",
                "memory",
                "embeddings",
                "vector-database",
                "pixeltable",
                "mcp"
            ]
        },
        {
            "name": "agency",
            "version": "0.2.3",
            "description": "Comprehensive workflow automation toolkit for the complete software development lifecycle. Includes 51+ specialized agents, composable workflow commands, and intelligent orchestration for requirements gathering, planning, implementation, testing, and deployment.",
            "source": {
                "source": "github",
                "repo": "squirrelsoft-dev/agency"
            },
            "category": "development",
            "tags": [
                "workflow",
                "automation",
                "agents",
                "orchestration",
                "project-management",
                "code-review",
                "testing"
            ]
        }
    ]
}
